text: John Stoughton (died 1422 or after), of Guildford, Surrey, was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Guildford in 1419. He was the son of John Stoughton, and the father is the one named regularly in other records – nothing further is known of the MP. The Stoughton family represented Guildford many times.http://www.historyofparliamentonline.org/volume/1386-1421/member/stoughton- john ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:15th-century deaths Category:English MPs 1419 Category:Members of Parliament for Guildford
title: John Stoughton (MP)
